title: Mobile-Based Social Interaction-Enhanced Mathematics Problem-Solving Project in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of College-Level Foundational Mathematics (Calculus, Linear Algebra)
context.additional_context: Utilizes collaborative tools (Google Jamboard, Padlet, etc.) on learners' personal smartphones to develop field-applicable math modeling cases

learning_goals: Learners can record at least three instances of solving math problems through social interaction with peers using mobile tools
Learners can visually represent problem-solving strategies applying math concepts (graphs/diagrams) in digital collaboration spaces
Learners can improve the mathematical logic of project deliverables by at least two levels based on peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
